gcf

public static void gcf(nrutil.pDouble gammcf,
                       double a,
                       double x,
                       nrutil.pDouble gln)
Returns the incomplete gamma function Q(a, x) evaluated by its continued fraction representation as gammcf. Also returns ln Γ(a) as gln.

Parameters:
gammcf - on return produces continued fraction representation of Q(a,x), a pDouble object
a - an argument of Q(a,x), a double
x - an argument of Q(a,x), a double
gln - on return prouces ln Γ(a), a pDouble object

erffc

betai

public static double betai(double a,
                           double b,
                           double x)
Returns the incomplete beta function I(a, b;x) = 1/B(a,b;x) ∫ 0x t a-1 (1-t) b-1 dt, (a,b > 0)

Parameters:
a - first argument of I(a,b;x), a double
b - second argument of I(a,b;x), a double
x - third argument of I(a,b;x), a double
Returns:
value of incomplete beta function I(a,b;x), a double
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a and b are not > 0 or x is not between 0 and 1 both inclusive in the argumets of I(a,b;x);

NormalCDF

public static double NormalCDF(double x)
For given x, returns the value of the normal cummulative density function Φ(x) = Prob( X ≤ x ), X is a standard Normal variable

Parameters:
x - the argument of the normal cummulative density function Φ(x), a double, could be positive or negative
Returns:
the value of the normal cummulative density funciton Φ(x), a double

NormalCDFInverse

public static double NormalCDFInverse(double p)
Returns x for given p in p = Prob( X ≤ x ) ≡ Φ(x) , X is a standard normal random variable

Parameters:
p - the argument of the invese Normal distribution funciton
Returns:
x such that p = Prob( X ≤ x ), X is a standard Normal variable

NormalPDF

public static double NormalPDF(double x)
Normal probability density function with mean zero and variance 1

Parameters:
x - argument of the density function, a double
Returns:
probability density at x, a double

StudentsTCDF

public static double StudentsTCDF(double x,
                                  int n)
The probability that a Student's t random variable takes a value less than or equal to x, a double value

Parameters:
x - at which the distribution function to be evaluated, a double
n - the number of degrees of freedom, an int, should be at least one
Returns:
The Prob (T ≤ x).

FCDF

public static double FCDF(double x,
                          int n1,
                          int n2)
F-distribution function, i.e., probability of the F-random variable taking value ≤ x, a double value

Parameters:
x - at which the distribution function to be evaluated, a double
n1 - the number of degrees of freedom in the numerator, an int, should be at least one
n2 - the number of degrees of freedom in the denominator, an int, should be at least one
Returns:
The Prob (F ≤ x).

ChiSquareCDF

public static double ChiSquareCDF(double x,
                                  int n)
The probability that a χ2 random variable with degrees of freedom n takes a value less than or equal to x

Parameters:
x - at which the distribution function to be evaluated, a double
n - the number of degrees of freedom, an int, should be at least one
Returns:
The Prob (χ2 ≤ x).
